text: Vestido de Etiqueta por Eduardo Magallanes is the thirtieth and final studio album by Juan Gabriel, released on August 12, 2016. A bonus DVD was included. The album was released 16 days before Juan Gabriel’s death. Vestido de Etiqueta por Eduardo Magallanes reached number one on the Billboard Top Latin Albums chart in the United States. ==Disc 1== ==Disc 2== ==DVD== La producción de los videoclips se dió en el teatro Peón Contreras en la ciudad de Mérida, tuvo la participación del videógrafo personal de Juan Gabriel, el Juarense Jesús Ochoa, de los cuales se mantienen algunos videos inéditos. ==Promotion== Juan Gabriel embarked on the Mexico Es Todo Tour performing his final concert at The Forum in Inglewood, California. == Charts == ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) | 1 |- ! scope="row"| Spanish Albums (PROMUSICAE) | 55 |- |- |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center" |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2016) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) | 7 |- !scope="row"|US Billboard Latin Albums | 6 |- ! scope="col"| Chart (2017) ! scope="col"| Peak position |- ! scope="row"| Mexican Albums (AMPROFON) | 96 |} ===Certification=== == References == * * Category:Juan Gabriel albums Category:2016 albums Category:Spanish-language albums Category:Fonovisa Records albums
title: Vestido de Etiqueta por Eduardo Magallanes
